alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:59AM AKST until December 23 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT SNOWFALL FOR PARTS OF SE AK THROUGH CHRISTMAS... .Multiple bands of precip will pass over the panhandle through the weekend and bring significant snowfall. This morning, we are starting to see light snow being reported in the southern panhandle and we expect this to become more widespread and slowly spread north through the morning hours. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Snow will begin to mix with rain Friday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates will be during the daylight hours on Friday. Locally higher snow amounts are possible in locations away from water and at elevation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
